objects.description: Monitor executed commands and arguments that may attempt to dump credentials using tools like [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002), ProcDump, NTDSUtil, or accessing /proc, /etc/passwd, and /etc/shadow. Analytic 1 - Suspicious command execution involving credential dumping tools. (index=security sourcetype="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode=4688 Image IN ("*mimikatz.exe", "*procdump.exe", "*ntdsutil.exe", "*powershell.exe") CommandLine IN ("*Invoke-Mimikatz*", "*Invoke-CachedCredentials*", "*Invoke-LSADump*", "*Invoke-SAMDump*")) OR (index=security sourcetype="linux_secure" Command IN ("cat /etc/passwd", "cat /etc/shadow", "grep -E '^[0-9a-f-]* r' /proc/*/maps")) OR (index=security sourcetype="macOS:UnifiedLog" process IN ("cat", "grep") message IN ("/etc/passwd", "/etc/shadow", "/var/db/shadow/hash/*", "/private/etc/master.passwd"))
